title: "Researchers develop machine learning model to improve Amazon carbon storage estimates"
excerpt: "A collaboration led by an Oregon State University College of Forestry researcher has used very-high-resolution satellite imagery to develop a machine learning model that aims to improve climate scientists' ability to estimate aboveground carbon stocks in the Amazon."
